What's in your Well Water?

We specialize in testing, diagnosing, and mitigating well water for your home. We take this job very seriously, it's our job to make sure you and your family is safe.

Top-notch Support & Crew

A dedicated crew with an extensive knowledge base of solutions for all of your water needs.

Water Dr LLC, Serving ALL of Connecticut

We specialize in residential well pump repairs, water pump installations and water filtration systems. From Well X Troll Tanks to deep submersible well pumps, you can count on us. We offer all our customers yearly maintenance and free in-home consultations for our products and services. Call us for all your water systems needs. Emergencies are our specialty!

Testimonials

My home required last minute water remediation for radon and uranium in the water before the closing. Rick was extremely knowledgeable about the multiple methods which could be used and suggested the most effective and cost efficient ones. Mat and the rest of the team showed up on time, completed the work in an efficient manner according to the required codes with a sense of aesthetics and left the basement clean. What more could anyone ask for. My wife and I cannot thank them enough.

— Richard Libes
